stories.title: Wired finally issued a correction after being called out

stories.text:
I read that article, it seems to have been posted 10+ times here since 1995.

Does intuit have this solved?

They were used as a case study for agile project management.

Does that solve the marketing/sales/mba take over? You all might have a better wording of my question. This is my first post, and I believe I read and searched for the proper approach. If wrong, I apologize. Hope you can offer some advice.
stories.title: Ask HN: Re:OSC’s, “How software co. die,” Are project managers the solution?

Google misdirects one in 10 searches for abortion to ‘pregnancy crisis centers’
C# .NET Web Application Tech Stack: Choosing the Front End

stories.text:
I started a new job at a tech company 3 months ago. From the start, it was a difficult place as two of my coworkers quit during the great resignation. And then obviously my responsibilities changed.

After a few changes in my responsibilities, I was frustrated and started looking for a new role. So far, I have two offers and wanted to check in on whether i should leave.

Skim notes

1. Joined a small tech company in an an analytics job.

2. Due to changing responsibilities, I started looking for a new job.

3. After 3 months, I have two offers as a data scientist
stories.title: Ask HN: New Job and They Keep Changing My Responsibilities
